# mgCov 

Multi-group Shared Subspace Covariance Estimation

Reference: [Shared Subspace Models for Multi-Group Covariance Estimation](https://arxiv.org/abs/1607.03045)

## Installation

Install `mgCov` using `devtools`:

```{r gh-installation, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("afranks86/mgCov")
```
